hero.title: CAPITAL OF TOMORROW
hero.description: A forum for young entrepreneurs ready to dream big, take action, and grow in a community of doers.

home.scroll: GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT GRANT

mission.title: OUR MISSION

description.one: Capital of Tomorrow is not just a typical business event - it's an event where young entrepreneurs can develop pitching and public speaking skills, acquire knowledge of and experience new approaches to international business, as well as find partners and investors. As part of this project, experienced entrepreneurs can become mentors and try their hand at business instruction, invest in bright and bold young projects and see young people’s fresh vision of domestic and international business. In addition, they will have an opportunity to present their projects and engage young audience, which will be done on the international level and face no limits.
description.two: Those who are on the verge of creating their own business and wish to get away from the hackneyed recruitment are offered a unique opportunity to touch the world of entrepreneurship and come to realize that nothing is impossible.

mission.adaptiveDescription: Capital of Tomorrow is where young entrepreneurs grow ideas, pitch to investors, and explore global business. Mentors can guide, invest, and connect with the next generation. For future founders, it’s a bold step into real entrepreneurship — no limits, just opportunities.

smallDescription.one: Capital of Tomorrow is where young entrepreneurs grow ideas, pitch to investors, and explore global business.
smallDescription.two: Mentors can guide, invest, and connect with the next generation. For future founders, it’s a bold step into real entrepreneurship — no limits, just opportunities.

goals.four: Create a community of like-minded people

one.title: Access to online course
one.content: Two weeks prior to the event, you will get access to the online course to receive useful tips on starting your business.

two.title: Pitch session (Grant Included)
two.content: Participants present their business ideas to experts and investors. The best project will receive a development grant. This is a chance to express yourself and take the first step towards the implementation of your idea.

three.title: Panel discussion
three.content: An open conversation with experienced entrepreneurs, investors, and opinion leaders. Topics includeexperiences, lessons learnt, best practices, and motivation for success. Participants can ask questions and get reliable answers.

four.title: Group workshops
four.content: We will put you into groups and give you an opportunity to pump up your business mindset by working on project improvement.

five.title: Informal networking during exploring new culture
five.content: A cultural event: exploring local cultures through music, interaction, cross-cultural communication, informal networking and friendly atmosphere.

six.title: Award ceremony
six.content: Partake in the most moving forum’s moment – the announcement of winners, awarding certificates and grants to the best ideas presented during the forum. Enjoy the festive atmosphere, recognize the participants’ achievements, take pride in and inspiration from others.

seven.title: Counseling
seven.content: Sign up for consultation (eligibility check required) on developing projects and ideas after the forum if you’re striving for international business.

one.title: What is Capital of Tomorrow?
one.content: Capital of Tomorrow is a new generation forum for young entrepreneurs, startups, and those who want to create their own business. It is a space of support, real action, and networking where ideas are transformed into projects.

two.title: Who is this forum for?
two.content: For beginners in business, startups, freelancers, students, young professionals, social entrepreneurs, mentors, investors, and anyone who wants to make a name for themselves and develop their own business.

three.title: Can I present my project?
three.content: Yes, each participant has the opportunity to present their idea on the Pitch stage. The best idea will receive a grant and mentoring support.

four.title: How to become a partner?
four.content: We are open to partnerships and invite companies, investors, and foundations to join us. Contact us to receive a partnership package.

five.title: Do I need to have a ready-made business to participate?
five.content: No, it is enough to have an idea or a desire to start a business. The forum is for those who are just starting out.

six.title: What language will the forum be held in?

seven.title: Will I receive a certificate?
seven.content: Yes, all participants will receive a certificate of participation.

eight.title: How does the grant idea competition work?
eight.content: Participants present their idea to the jury. The jury takes into account innovation, benefit, and potential for implementation.

nine.title: What happens if my visa is refused? Am I eligible for a refund?
nine.content:
Please note that there is no refund for payments made. However, the organisation provides an opportunity to receive an electronic voucher that can be used to participate in one of the following events.

For participants with a self-funded package:

In case of visa refusal, you will receive an electronic voucher for participation in a future event. The cost of issuing the invitation and VAT will be deducted from the payment amount. The remaining amount will be provided in the form of a voucher.

If you ordered only an exclusive invitation letter:

In this case, no refund or voucher will be issued, as this service is non-refundable once it is issued.

ten.title: What if I do not have a passport?
ten.content: Applicants are strongly advised to hold a valid passport for travel. However, you may apply by uploading your National/Student ID in the passport section and ensure your passport is secured before the event date.

smallBlocks.two: You strive to make your business international
smallBlocks.three: You have an idea but don't know where to begin

largeBlocks.one: OUR FORUM IS DEFINITELY FOR YOU IF
largeBlocks.two: YOU WANT TO MASTER SELF-PRESENTATION AND BUSINESS SKILLS

one.title: APPLICATION SUBMISSION
one.description: Complete the online application form and pay the required application fee to confirm your submission.

two.title: EVALUATION AND SELECTION
two.description: Applications will be reviewed by an independent selection committee considering leadership potential, impact, and alignment with the summit’s vision.

three.title: RESULTS DISTRIBUTION
three.description: Shortlisted candidates will be notified via email with further details on their selection and next steps.

listItems.two: Accommodation and meals are provided both for fully and partly funded
listItems.three: Reimbursement of flight expenses for fully funded in amount of no more 250 USD
listItems.five: Opportunity to perform on the global stage

listItems.two: Confirmation of participation for the embassy

listItems.eight: Expert consultations for six months after the forum

one.title: Increased brand awareness.
one.text: Your brand will gain visibility in front of the target audience through all communication channels of the event - from social media to offline space.

two.title: Access to the audience of young entrepreneurs and startups.
two.text: This is a chance to interact directly with ambitious founders, innovators, and future business leaders - those who are shaping the next generation economy.

three.title: Stand out among colleagues and competitors.
three.text: Participation in the forums program gives you the opportunity to declare yourself as a brand that supports development, innovation, and progress.

four.title: Direct interaction with participants.
four.text: You will be able to present your products, get feedback, network and find new customers or partners.

listItems.one: Logo on the website and printed materials
listItems.four: Access to photo and video materials
listItems.six: Brochure stand in the ballroom, 3 posts in social media

listItems.three: Stand table with company representative and merchandising
listItems.four: 5 posts on social media and 1 vertical video about the company; company brochure added to participants' merchandise

listItems.two: Logo of the company will be provided on our landing and event page forever
listItems.four: Presentation of the grant to the participant
listItems.five: Mention of your logo and slogan in every video on our social media channels for the entire period before the project and 1 month afterwards
listItems.six: Thank-you speech from the head of Vostochnik Events

hero.title: APPLICATION FORM
hero.content: We invite bold dreamers and creators to Capital of Tomorrow, a forum for the next generation of entrepreneurs to be held in Dubai on November 26-28, 2025. If you are a startup, future entrepreneur, visionary, or social innovator, this is the place for you. This is not just a forum, but a place where ambitions meet support and ideas become action. It's time to act - your idea, your voice, your path starts here.

declaration.content: I declare that the information provided in this application is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I hereby consent & agree to abide by the aforementioned terms and conditions. I understand that any false information may result in disqualification from the scholarship.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions:
terms.one: The application fee is mandatory, non-refundable under any circumstances, and applies to this category as it covers the associated costs of event participation as a self-funded delegate. Incomplete applications will not be considered for evaluation or selection.
terms.two: After submission, applicants will be notified via email and must confirm their participation within the specified timeframe. Failure to confirm within the given period may result in the forfeiture of the opportunity.
terms.three: By submitting an application, participants grant the organisers of Capital of Tomorrow 2025 the right to use their name, biography, and submitted materials for promotional purposes related to the event.
terms.four: Personal information provided in the application will be used solely for the purpose of evaluation and event organisation. The organisers will handle personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws and regulations.
terms.five: Delegate selection will be conducted by an independent panel of judges, including high-profile board members from European countries. All selection outcomes are final and non-negotiable.
terms.six: Vostocnik Solution is not liable for any loss, injury, damage, or theft during the event.
terms.seven: Attendees are responsible for their personal belongings and must adhere to safety regulations and instructions. The organising team will be available to provide assistance when needed.
terms.eight: By participating, attendees agree not to pursue legal action against the organisation regarding application fee refunds.
terms.nine: Participants also commit to refraining from any oral, visual, or auditory defamation of the organisation, particularly if they disagree with their assigned category. Any violation of this provision will lead to legal consequences.
terms.ten: By submitting an application, participants acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions.

four.payment_consent: I agree to the processing of my personal data and payment information

hero.title: VIP PACKAGE
hero.content: The VIP package is designed for discerning participants who value comfort, privacy, and high-level connections. It provides not only enhanced service and luxury, but also strategic advantages throughout your forum journey.

vipData.paragraph: VIP is more than access — it’s influence, insight, and investment in your success.

one.title: Premium Accommodation
one.content: Enjoy your stay in a Superior Lux single room — a spacious, elegantly appointed suite that offers complete privacy, comfort, and a refined atmosphere ideal for rest and preparation.

two.title: VIP Airport Transfer
two.content: Travel in style with a personal airport transfer in a Mercedes V-Class with captain seats or a vehicle of equivalent luxury. Your arrival is seamless, private, and entirely stress-free.

four.title: Exclusive One-on-One Consultations
four.content: Gain direct access to leading experts through individual consultations tailored to your personal or business objectives. This is your opportunity to discuss real challenges and find actionable insights.

five.title: Extended Expert Support
five.content: Your forum experience doesn't end when the event does. VIP participants receive six months of post-forum expert guidance to support implementation and long-term impact.

six.title: Premium Merchandise Package
six.content: Receive an exclusive VIP gift set — carefully curated, high-quality items that reflect the prestige of your participation.

seven.title: Full-Service Support at Every Stage
seven.content: From pre-event planning to on-site assistance and post-event follow-up, VIP guests receive dedicated support to ensure a smooth and optimized experience.

eight.title: Strategic Forum Benefits
eight.content: From pre-event planning to on-site assistance and post-event follow-up, VIP guests receive dedicated support to ensure a smooth and optimized experience.

nine.title: Strategic Forum Benefits
nine.content: As a VIP, you'll have greater opportunities to network with key speakers, decision-makers, and high-level attendees. You gain access to rooms and moments where real partnerships begin.

note.one: Please note: Participants are solely responsible for obtaining their own travel documents, including visas. The organisers do not take responsibility for  refusals or delays. In the event of a participant’s decision to withdraw or if   unable to attend (including due to visa refusal), only 50% of the total order cost refundable.
note.two: Incomplete applications will not be considered for evaluation or participation. After submission, applicants will be notified via email and must confirm their participation within the specified timeframe. Failure to confirm on time may result in forfeiting the VIP delegate opportunity.
note.three: By submitting this application, participants grant the organisers of Capital of Tomorrow 2025 the right to use their name, biography, and any submitted materials for event-related promotional purposes.
note.four: Personal information provided in the application will be used solely for the purpose of evaluation and event organisation. The organisers will handle personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws and regulations.
note.five: Delegate selection will be conducted by an independent panel of judges, including high-profile board members from European countries. All selection outcomes are final and non-negotiable.
note.six: Vostocnik Solution is not responsible for any loss, injury, damage, or theft during the event. Attendees are expected to safeguard their belongings and follow all event safety protocols. Assistance from the organising team will be available as needed.
note.seven: By participating, attendees waive the right to legal claims against the organisation related to application fees or partial refunds.
note.eight: Participants also commit to refraining from any oral, visual, or auditory defamation of the organisation, particularly if they disagree with their assigned category. Any violation of this provision will lead to legal consequences.
note.nine: By submitting this application, participants confirm that they have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions.

hero.title: VOSTOCHNIK
hero.subtitle: SOLUTIONS & EVENTS
hero.paragraph: WE ORGANIZE BUSINESS FORUMS WITH ACCELERATION PROGRAMS AND PROVIDE TAILORED ANALYTICAL SOLUTIONS FOR GROWING COMPANIES

events.title: OUR EVENTS
events.paragraph: OUR EVENTS HELP ENTREPRENEURS IMPROVE PITCHING AND PUBLIC SPEAKING SKILLS, GAIN UP-TO-DATE KNOWLEDGE, EXPLORE NEW APPROACHES TO INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS, AND CONNECT WITH PARTNERS AND INVESTORS.

list.one: SUPPORT FOR YOUNG TALENT AND EXPERIENCED LEADERS
list.two: THE POWER OF COMMUNITY AND NETWORKING
list.eight: DEVELOPMENT AT ALL STAGES OF THE PATH

solutions.title: SOLUTIONS
solutions.subtitle: WE SPECIALIZE IN PREPARING COMPANIES TO ENTER THE MIDDLE EAST AND RUSSIAN MARKETS. OUR EXPERTISE INCLUDES OPERATIONAL EXIT AND INVESTMENT RAISING FOR COMPANIES SEEKING INTERNATIONAL GROWTH AND PROFITABILITY IN NEW MARKETS

one.title: Strategic Consulting
one.content: Comprehensive market and competitor analysis: study of local companies and foreign corporations, determination of their shares in the target market.

two.title: Legal Consulting
two.content: Detailed review of potential forms of operation in the target country with a description of all legal requirements for successful market entry.

three.title: Marketing and PR
three.content: Brand adaptation to cultural nuances and effective promotion in the local market taking into account regional specifics.

four.title: Financial Consulting
four.content: Detailed analysis of investment activity in the Middle East countries

inex.title: INEX is an expert in service design and customer experience (CX).
inex.paragraph: Since 2008, the company has been exploring customer journeys, creating and implementing services for major corporations, training teams, and fostering a culture of customer centricity.

psychgeo.title: PHYSGEO - leaders of the oil and gas consulting industry.
psychgeo.paragraph: They develop the largest fields, implement cutting-edge technologies, and set the pace for the entire industry.
